mapper.select: select m.code_number, m.code_name, c.category_count from master_code m inner join category_count c on m.code_number = c.code_number where m.code_group = '0001' order by c.category_count desc
select m.code_name, m.code_number from review_board r inner join category c on r.review_seq = c.review_seq inner join master_code m on c.code_number = m.code_number where r.review_seq = #{reviewSeq}
